text: Hi there, Informics is US-Based IT services company specializing in CRM/ERP implementation, custom development, data analytics, RPA, and more. We are HubSpot Solutions Partner. We are expanding our HubSpot team in India and looking for a fulltime resource to join us. If you are interested, please send your resume to <mailto:careers@informicsdigital.com|careers@informicsdigital.com>
